name: Lose a Letter Lexicon Ladder Pt 13 Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here's a playing tip - If you can't solve the first clue go to one of the others that you can solve, and then work up and down from there.
First word of seven letters -

Male who gives massage.

Now drop one letter from the previous answer and rearrange the remaining letters to make the new word of six letters-

To surmise.

Third word of five letters -

The joins in pieces of cloth.

Fourth word of four letters -

Identical.

Fifth word of three letters -

A large area of salt water.

Start a new word of six letters -

Alloy of copper and tin.

Second word of five letters -

An embarrassing mistake.

Third word of four letters -

Loose outer garment.

Forth word of three letters -

Spherical object.

Fifth word of two letters -

Slight body odour.
